department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in stretch satin with a slight sheen. Narrow notch lapels with stitching at the edges, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
